articles.title: Simpsons Hit and Run remake in Unreal 5 puts a cult classic in an open world
articles.description: A fan has remade the 2003 cult classic The Simpsons: Hit & Run in Unreal Engine 5, adding in a hefty number of details that befit 2022 — like an open world map, better vehicles, and online multiplayer.
articles.content: Its not available for others to play, but watching the design process is engrossing

articles.title: Thai cave rescue movie Thirteen Lives takes divers on terrifying mission
articles.description: Thirteen Lives is based on 2018’s Tham Luang cave rescue in Thailand and stars Viggo Mortensen, Joel Edgerton, and Collin Farrell and is directed by Ron Howard. It will be released in theaters on July 29 and on Prime Video on August 5.
